      • Server

        public Server(int port,
      boolean usesEncryption,
      int maxBytes,
      java.lang.String verifyCode)
        Parameters:
        port - - the port of which the server should run
        maxBytes - - the maximum amount of bytes the server should be able to send
        usesEncryption - - whether or not the server should use encryption
        verifyCode - - used to ensure that connecting clients are from the correct game
